text: De Pers (literal translation: The Press) was a freely distributed Dutch language tabloid newspaper in the Netherlands, with a circulation of around 200,000. Its competitors were Metro and Sp!ts. The first edition of De Pers was published on January 23, 2007 and its last edition was published March 30, 2012. ==External links== * Category:2007 establishments in the Netherlands Category:2012 disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Defunct newspapers published in the Netherlands Category:Dutch-language newspapers Category:Daily newspapers published in the Netherlands Category:Mass media in Amsterdam Category:Publications established in 2007 Category:Publications disestablished in 2012
title: De Pers
